(Simplified: 绁)
Chinese Definition:
①繩索，系牲口的繮繩：大紲(粗大的繩索)。縲紲(捆綁犯人的繩索)。羈紲(馬轡，喻束縛)。
②系，拴：紲馬。“紲子嬰於軹塗”。
(Simplified: 绁)

紲字的基本解释

紲
xiè
见“绁”。

紲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》私列切，入薛，心。］
亦作“絏1”。亦作“緤1”。“绁1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)牵牲畜的绳子；绳索。
(2)缚罪人的绳索。
(3)拴；缚。
(4)弓。即竹制的弓檠。弓卸去弦后缚在弓里以防损伤的用具。
[②]［yì］
通“跇1”。“绁2”的繁体字。
超越。

紲字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　紲； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页920第01
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?私列切，音薛。【說文】系也。或从枼作緤。【玉篇】馬韁也。凡繫縲牛馬皆曰紲。　又【詩·鄘風】蒙彼縐絺，是紲袢也。【疏】紲袢者，去熱之名。　又【周禮·冬官考工記·弓人】恆角而達，辟如終紲，非弓之利也。【註】紲，弓䪐。　又【前漢·揚雄傳】亶觀夫票禽之紲隃。【註】師古曰：紲與跇同。　【廣韻】紲亦作絏。俗作靾。

绁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" private column cut, enter Xue, heart. ]
Also known as "绁1". Also known as "緤1". Traditional characters for "绁1". Also known as "1".
(1) A rope for holding livestock; a rope.
(2) The rope that binds sinners.
(3) Tie; tie.
(4) Bow . It is a bamboo bow. A tool that is tied to the bow after the bow is unloaded to prevent damage.
[②]［yì］
Linked with "跇1". Traditional characters for "绁2".
Beyond.
绁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　绁; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 920 01
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Private column cut, sound Xue. [Said the text] Department also. Or from the stubbornness. [Jade articles] Horse rein also. All the horses and cows are called scorpions.　[Poetry·Fengfeng] Mengbi crepe, it is a scorpion. 【Sparse】Those who are shabby, go to the name of heat.　[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Bow Man】Have a constant angle, and it is like the end of the bow. It is not the benefit of the bow. [Note] Luo, Gong Li.　[Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Guan Guan's husband is a bird's nest. [Note] Shi Gu said: 灁 and 跇 are the same.　【Guangyun】Liao is also used as a 绁. Popular as a salamander.
